project_id.title: Project ID
project_id.description: A unique ID for the Project to which data will be assigned

project_name.title: Project Name
project_name.description: A unique Name for the Project

project_description.title: Project Description
project_description.description: Project purpose and/or summary, must provide either project description or supply a Project Attachment

sampling_design_type.title: Sampling Design Type
sampling_design_type.description: A code used to identify the type of sampling design employed for this project to ensure that sampling activities can support project objectives.

qapp_approved_indicator.title: QAPP Approved Indicator
qapp_approved_indicator.description: Indicates whether a Quality Assurance Project Plan (QAPP) has been approved for the submitted project.

qapp_approval_agency_name.title: QAPP Approval Agency Name
qapp_approval_agency_name.description: An outside approval authority identifier for the QAPP (e.g. EPA or State Organization).

project_attachment_file_name.title: Project Attachment File Name
project_attachment_file_name.description: The text describing the descriptive name used to represent the file, including file extension.  Must provide either project description or supply a Project Attachment

project_attachment_type.title: Project Attachment Type
project_attachment_type.description: File text extension, free text not domain list validation.  Required if Project Attachment File Name is reported.
